qa.question: Describe a time you used advanced Excel functions to solve a business problem.
qa.answer: I used INDEX-MATCH to merge two datasets and created a dashboard with dynamic charts for management.

eval.feedback: Excellent use of advanced functions and visualization.
suggestions: Try using Power BI for even more dynamic dashboards.
